channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023120319
item.description:
Report X-2023120319

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-21T18:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-02
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in heat-sealed plastic bags inside corrugated carton with corrugated stabilizer/divider insert. Loose cap came off one jug and allowed spillage which damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023120345
item.description:
Report X-2023120345

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-03
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Qa was called to unload and pkg. was on ground leaking out and QA put inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage. DescribePack: plastic gallon was cracked and all the liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottles. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a linded tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023120344
item.description:
Report X-2023120344

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-03
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to the unload door 57 and pkg. was on the ground wet and leaking and QA placed inside a lined tote and when inspected 1 gallon had closure come loose and liquid leaked out soiling whole shipment.. DescribePack: Closure came loose which caused the liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and placed in hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023120665
item.description:
Report X-2023120665

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered wet after receiving an IC scan. As soon as it was discovered wet, it was placed into a damage tote complete with liner, orientation arrows being followed. DescribePack: Contents that leaked had lids that were about a half turn loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into damage tote complete with liner. Orientation arrows were observed. Leak was contained to packaging.

item.title: Report X-2023120379
item.description:
Report X-2023120379

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-04
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an Admin's assistance over the radio. DescribePack: Three of the four bottles had loose lids which led to the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The Admin contained the damaged hazmat in a hazardous material spill tote then transported the shipment to the hazmat cage for processing.

DescribePack: Inner closure broke and the liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottles. DurationRel: 21 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. ws placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023120108
item.description:
Report X-2023120108

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Metal jerricans in doublewall corrugated carton with integrated corrugated divider flaps. Loos caps on two jerricans allowed leakage which damaged adhesives of tape and labels and soiled carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.
